biotools.summary:
Genotype-free individual genome reconstruction of Multiparental Population Models by RNA sequencing data.

GBRS is a suite of tools for reconstructing genomes using RNA-Seq data from multiparent population and quantifying allele specific expression.

bioschemas.name: GBRS
bioschemas.summary:

GBRS is a suite of tools for reconstructing genomes using RNA-Seq data from multiparent population and quantifying allele specific expression.
